issue.title: [JS] Bn shouldn't override constructor of the resulting typed array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4477](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4477). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's an undefined constructor property definition in the `Object.assign()` call for the BigNum mixins that's overriding the constructor of the returned TypedArrays. I think this was left over from the first iteration where I used `Object.create()`. These should be removed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4477?focusedCommentId=16760651) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3557
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3557>
